head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHIRK, (BUCHLER) EVELYN U. (PH.D)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHIRK, (BUCHLER) EVELYN U. (PH.D)

block.p: SHIRK-(Buchler) Evelyn U. (Ph.D), of Garden City, Long Island, NY, on August 24, 1997. Wife of Justus Buchler, Ph.D., who died in 1991; beloved mother of Katherine Buchler, Ephrata, PA; sister of Marilyn Forman, Atlanta, GA. A professor of Philosophy, Hofstra University for forty years; a published author; a Daughter of the American Revolution. A private memorial service will be held. Memorials to: The Philosophy Dept., Heger Hall, Room 104, 115 Hofstra University, Hempstead, NY 11549, or The National Wildlife Federation, 8925 Leesburg Pike, Vienna, VA. 22184.
